resources.string: When each stimulus appears, press anywhere on the screen as fast as you can. Your response time will then be shown in 100ths of a second.\nTouch the screen to start.
Thank you for participating.\nYou are now finished.
In this task, you will be presented with a series of simple words (war, clock, windy, kill). Your job is to indicate, as quickly as possible, the color you are thinking of reading the word.
